sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Cook County Board of Review Redistricting Act of 2021.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Cook County Board of Review Redistricting Act of 2021.

sections.heading: Findings. In enacting this redistricting plan, the General Assembly finds and declares all of the following:
sections.text: Findings. In enacting this redistricting plan, the General Assembly finds and declares all of the following:

sections.heading: Board of Review Districts. Cook County is divided into 3 Board of Review Districts as set forth in this Act
sections.text: Cook County Board of Review District 1 consists of the following:

sections.heading: The Cook County Board of Review Districts Act is repealed.
sections.text: The Cook County Board of Review Districts Act is repealed.

sections.heading: The Cook County Board of Review Districts Act of 2001 is repealed.
sections.text: The Cook County Board of Review Districts Act of 2001 is repealed.

sections.heading: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.
sections.text: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
